sections.description: Base html elements styling
Additional body styles
sections.css:
body
  min-width: 320px
  font-weight: $font-weight

// Specific body styles that should be only used for the styleguide
.body
  font-family: $font-family-base
  font-size: $font-size-base
  line-height: $line-height-base
  color: $text-color
  min-width: 320px
  font-weight: $font-weight

@font-face
  font-family: 'Roboto'
  font-style: normal
  font-weight: 300
  src: local("Roboto Light"), local("Roboto-Light"), url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/roboto/v15/Hgo13k-tfSpn0qi1SFdUfVtXRa8TVwTICgirnJhmVJw.woff2) format("woff2"), url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/roboto/v15/Hgo13k-tfSpn0qi1SFdUfT8E0i7KZn-EPnyo3HZu7kw.woff) format("woff")

@font-face
  font-family: 'Roboto'
  font-style: normal
  font-weight: 400
  src: local("Roboto"), local("Roboto-Regular"), url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/roboto/v15/CWB0XYA8bzo0kSThX0UTuA.woff2) format("woff2"), url(http://fonts.gstatic.com/s/roboto/v15/2UX7WLTfW3W8TclTUvlFyQ.woff) format("woff")

@font-face

  font-style: normal
  font-weight: 700

@font-face

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-pills
  // Fix for centering pills with text-center class in parent element.
  display: inline-block
  > li
    & > a
      color: $gray-light
      &:hover
        background-color: transparent
        color: $text-color
    // Active state
    &.active > a
      &,
      &:hover,
      &:focus
        color: $nav-pills-active-link-hover-color
        background-color: $nav-pills-active-link-hover-bg

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-pills--large
  > li > a
    font-family: $headings-font-family
    font-size: $font-size-h2

.nav-pills--arrows
  &:after
    border-bottom: 1px solid $gray-light
    width: 100%
  > li
    margin-bottom: -1px
    &.active > a
      &,
      &:hover,
      &:focus
        +arrow($gray-light, white, "bottom", "in", 10px, 25px)
        background: transparent
        color: $nav-pills-active-link-hover-bg
sections.renderMarkup:

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tabs
  border: none
  margin: -8px 0 0
  overflow: hidden
  text-transform: uppercase
  font-weight: $headings-font-weight
  // z-index configuration for .listing--tabs-spacer class of included view.
  position: relative
  z-index: 1
  &:after
    content: ''
    width: 100%
    display: block
    border-bottom: 1px $gray-light solid
    position: absolute
    bottom: 0

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tabs > li
  background-color: $gray-lighter
  margin: 10px 2px 0 0 !important
  font-size: $font-size-base
  padding: 0
  &:first-of-type
    margin-left: 20px !important
  a
    color: darken($gray-light, 35%)
    line-height: $line-height-computed
    padding: 13px 20px
    margin: 0
    border-radius: 0
  &.active
    margin: 6px 3px -1px 0 !important
    z-index: 1
    border-top: 5px solid $tabs-accent !important
    +shadow($gray-lighter, 0, 0, 5px, 2px)
    a
      &,
      &:focus,
      &:hover
        border-left: 1px $gray-light solid
        border-right: 1px $gray-light solid
        margin: 0
        color: $gray-base
        background-color: $tabs-active-background

sections.description: Override of Bootstrap's pagination @see http://getbootstrap.com/components/#pagination
sections.markup:
• 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • …
sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.pagination
  padding: 0
  margin: 50px 0 40px !important

  & > li
    padding: 0 !important
    margin: 0 !important
    &:before
      display: none

    & > a,
    & > span
      border: none
      border-radius: 25px !important
      color: $gray-lighter

      &:hover,
      &:active,
      &:focus
        background: none
        text-decoration: underline
        color: $gray-darker

    &.active
      & > span
       background-color: $blue-dark
       color: #fff !important

    &.prev,
    &.next
      & > a
        color: $gray-darker
        line-height: 8px
        &:before,
        &:after
          font-size: 34px
          position: relative
          top: 4px
          display: inline-block

    &.prev
      & > a
        &:before
          content: "‹"
          right: 10px

    &.next
      & > a
        &:after
          content: "›"
          left: 10px

    @media (max-width: $screen-xxs-max)
      &.prev,
      &.next
        & > a
          display: block
          width: 100%
          text-align: left
      &.prev > a
          margin-bottom: 20px

      &.next > a
          margin-top: 10px

sections.description: Override of Bootstrap's panels @see http://getbootstrap.com/components/#panels
sections.markup:
Panel title #1

First panel body

Panel title #2

Second panel body
sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.panel-group
  .panel
    padding-bottom: 20px
    & + .panel
      margin-top: 0
      padding-top: 20px
      border-top: 1px solid $brand-primary-gray !important
      border-radius: 0
    &:last-child
      padding-bottom: 0

.panel-default
  border: none !important
  +box-shadow(none)
  .panel-heading
    padding: 0
    border-radius: 0 !important
    background: $gray-lighter
    a
      outline: 0
      text-decoration: none
  .panel-title
    padding: 15px 15px
    margin: 0
    @extend .h4
  .panel-body
    margin-top: 20px
    padding: 0
    border: none !important
    &:before,
    &:after
      display: none
    & > *
      &:last-child
        padding-bottom: 0
        margin-bottom: 0
        border-bottom: none

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.panel-group--horizontal
  +rotate(-90, right top)
  z-index: 100
  width: $panel-group-horizontal-height
  height: $panel-group-horizontal-height
  margin: 30px 0 0
  .panel + .panel
    padding-top: 1px
    border: none !important
  .panel
    width: $panel-group-horizontal-height
    padding-bottom: 0
  .panel-heading,
  .panel-collapse
    width: 100%
  .panel-collapse
    height: $panel-group-horizontal-body-width
  .panel-title
    +rotate(180, right 50% 0)
    font-family: $font-family-base
    font-weight: $font-weight
    text-transform: none
    padding: 5px 10px
    height: 30px
  .panel-body
    background-color: $panel-group-horizontal-bg
    position: relative
    width: $panel-group-horizontal-height
    height: $panel-group-horizontal-body-width
    margin: 0
    font-size: $font-size-small
    ul
      margin-left: 0
      padding-left: 10px
      list-style: none
      li:before
        content: ''
        margin: 5px 0 0 -10px
        float: left
        +circle(white, 1px, $orange)
        width: 6px
        height: 6px
        display: block
    big
      font-family: $headings-font-family
      font-weight: $headings-font-weight
      font-size: $font-size-h3
  .panel__rotate-wrapper
    +rotate(90, right top)
    position: absolute
    width: $panel-group-horizontal-body-width
    height: $panel-group-horizontal-height
    right: -$panel-group-horizontal-body-width
    bottom: -$panel-group-horizontal-height
    padding: 20px !important

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.panel.is-active
  .panel-heading
    background-color: $orange
    +arrow($orange, $orange, "bottom", "out", 10px, 30px)
    .panel-title
      color: #fff
      font-weight: $headings-font-weight

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------

.table,
table
  font-size: $font-size-small
  & > thead > tr > th,
  & > thead > tr > td,
  & > tbody > tr > th,
  & > tbody > tr > td,
  & > tfoot > tr > th,
  & > tfoot > tr > td
    text-align: center
    vertical-align: middle
  & > thead > tr > th
    text-transform: uppercase
    font-weight: $font-weight
    background-color: $table-bg-header
    font-size: $font-size-small - 3
    line-height: $line-height-computed / 2
    padding-top: 4px
    padding-bottom: 4px
    text-align: left

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.table-bordered
  border-left: none
  border-right: none
  > thead > tr
    > th,
    > td
      border-bottom: none

.table-striped
  > tbody > tr:nth-child(odd)
    background-color: transparent
  > tbody > tr:nth-child(even)
    background-color: $table-bg-accent

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.bookmark
  // position: absolute
  // top: 170px
  // right: 0
  text-align: center
  background-color: $brand-primary
  width: 50px
  border-bottom-left-radius: 15px
  font-family: $font-family-sans-condensed
  text-transform: uppercase
  z-index: 100
  .icon
    +icon-size(40px)
    margin: 5px
    display: block
  +breakpoint(tablet)
    top: 205px

  +breakpoint(lg-desktop)
    top: 115px
    width: 115px
    .icon
      display: none
    .bookmark__text
      display: block
      padding: 5px 10px

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------

.bookmark__link,
.bookmark__link:hover,
.bookmark__link:visited
  color: #fff
  text-decoration: none

.bookmark__text
  display: none
  +breakpoint(lg-desktop)
    display: block
    padding: 5px 10px

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.box
  position: relative
  padding: 20px
  margin-bottom: 30px
  background-color: $gray-lighter
  font-size: $font-size-h4
  overflow: hidden
  & > *
    z-index: 2
    position: relative
  .btn .icon
    color: $brand-primary
  .btn-default
    background-color: $gray-lighter
  a
    &:hover,
    &:active,
    &:focus
      color: $gray-base
      text-decoration: none
  strong
    color: $brand-primary
  select
    background-color: #fff
  p:last-child
    margin-bottom: 0

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.box__bg
  position: absolute
  left: 10px
  top: 50%
  margin: -85px 0
  color: $gray-lighter
  z-index: 1
  font-weight: 600
  +icon-size(170px)

.box__media
  margin: 0 -20px -20px
  img
    width: 100%

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.box--icon-to-right
  .box__bg
    left: auto
    right: -50px

.box--half-icon
  &:not(.box--icon-to-right) .box__bg
    left: -50px
  &.box--icon-to-right .box__bg
    right: -105px

.box--small
  padding-top: 10px
  padding-bottom: 10px
  margin-bottom: 10px
  font-size: $font-size-base
  strong
    color: $gray-base

.box--show-more__wrapper
  overflow: hidden
  position: relative

.box--brand-primary
  background-color: $brand-primary
  color: #fff
  .box__bg
    color: $brand-primary-dark

.box--arrow-bottom
  +arrow($brand-primary, $brand-primary, "bottom", "out", 15px, 110px)
  overflow: visible

// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.box
  .middle-align
    width: 100%
  .middle-align__col
    text-align: left
  .listing__header
    margin: -20px -20px 20px
    padding: 0 20px
    background-color: $gray-lighter
    .listing__header-title
      margin: 10px 0 5px
      border: none
  h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6
    margin-top: 0

.box--brand-primary
  .btn .icon
    color: #fff
  .btn-default
    background-color: $gray-base
    border-color: $gray-base
    color: #fff
  // Dependency on .contact component
  .contact__icon
    color: $brand-primary-lighter
    border-color: $brand-primary-lighter
  .contact__row
    padding-bottom: $line-height-computed / 2
  &.contact--listing
    padding: 15px 15px 0
    margin: 0
    border: none
    .contact
      padding: 0
      border: none
  // Dependency on .listung component
  .listing__header
    background-color: $brand-primary-dark
    border-bottom: 1px solid $brand-primary-light
    .listing__header-title
      color: #fff
  a
    color: #fff
  strong
    color: #fff

.box--light
  background-color: $almost-white

sections.description: Widget whith date and circular diagram how much time is left. Based on example http://codepen.io/rendro/pen/qazCG. Informations are shown horizontally or vertically to not take up unnecessary space on mobile devices depending on width of wrapping element. See example below how it works inside a bootstrap collumn (marked with dashed border). Resize browser window to see the differences.

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.counter
  position: relative
  text-transform: uppercase
  color: $gray-base
  overflow: hidden
  text-align: left

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.counter__pie
  position: static
  width: 60px
  height: 60px
  padding-top: 0
  vertical-align: middle
  font-size: $font-size-small - 3px
  line-height: 26px
  canvas
    position: absolute
    left: 0
    top: 0

.counter__left
  font-size: $font-size-h3 + 6
  height: 60px
  line-height: 60px
  text-align: center
  display: block
  font-weight: bold

.counter__label
  position: absolute
  top: 10px
  left: 75px
  font-weight: 600
  line-height: 26px
  font-size: $font-size-base

.counter__caption
  position: absolute
  left: 75px
  top: 34px
  font-size: $font-size-small - 2
  br
    display: none

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.counter.is-big
  text-align: center
  .counter__pie
    position: relative
    width: auto
    width: 120px
    height: 120px
    margin-bottom: 5px
  .counter__left
    padding-top: 40px
    font-size: $font-size-h1
    font-weight: 700
    line-height: $line-height-computed + 2
  .counter__label
    top: 70px
    left: 0
    right: 0
    font-size: $font-size-small - 3
  .counter__caption
    position: static
    top: auto
    left: auto
    font-size: $font-size-small
    br
      display: inline

.counter--fixed-big
  width: 120px
  margin: 0 10px 10px
  float: left

.counter--open
  &.counter.is-big
    .counter__label
      top: 0
      left: 0
      right: 0
      line-height: 120px
      font-size: $font-size-h3
      font-weight: bold
    .counter__left
      display: none

sections.description: Set of WAAT icons for any occasion. Since icons are fonts, they can be placed anywhere where text is placed and are sized automatically to match the surrounding child. Color of the icon might be declared same way as for text.
sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------

// Import the fonts
@font-face
  font-family: 'WAAT Icons'
  src: url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.eot")
  src: url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.eot?#iefix") format("embedded-opentype"), url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.woff") format("woff"), url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.ttf") format("truetype"), url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.svg#icomoon") format("svg")


.icon
  font-family: 'WAAT Icons'
  speak: none
  font-style: normal
  font-weight: normal
  font-variant: normal
  text-transform: none
  // To small icons fix.
  font-size: 175%
  display: inline-block
  line-height: 100%
  position: relative
  top: 6px
  margin-top: -8px
  // Better Font Rendering
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale

big .icon

  top: 12px
  margin-top: -20px

sections.description: Icon or any another content to place inside the form input. It works similiar like Bootstrap Input groups, but appears inside the input, not next to it.
sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.input-inner-addon
  position: absolute
  top: 0
  right: 0
  width: $input-height-base
  height: $input-height-base
  line-height: $input-height-base
  text-align: center

.input-lg + .input-inner-addon
  line-height: $input-height-large

.input-sm + .input-inner-addon
  line-height: $input-height-small

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.input-inner-addon__wrapper
  position: relative
  color: $brand-primary
  input
    padding-right: 30px

// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.input-inner-addon .icon
  font-size: $font-size-base * 2

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.middle-align
  +middle-align

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.middle-align__row
  // Row settings inherit from mixin

.middle-align__col
  // Col settings inherit from mixin

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.middle-align--mobile-single-column
  .middle-align__col
    display: block
    text-align: center
    padding-right: 0
    .middle-align__media
      width: 100%

  +breakpoint(desktop)
    .middle-align__col
      display: table-cell
      text-align: inherit
      &:not(:last-child)
        padding-right: 30px
      .middle-align__media
        width: auto

.middle-align--more-paddings
  padding: 25px 0

  +breakpoint(tablet)
    padding: 30px 0

  +breakpoint(desktop)
    padding: 40px 0

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-horizontal
  margin: 0
  font-size: $font-size-small
  margin: 15px 0

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-horizontal .nav-horizontal__item
  padding: 0 15px
  display: inline

.nav-horizontal__link
  color: $brand-primary-dark
  display: inline-block
  text-align: center

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-horizontal--condensed
  .nav-horizontal__item
    padding: 0 3px
    font-size: $font-size-xsmall
    &:not(:last-child)
      border-right: 1px solid $gray-base

.nav-horizontal--activeoverlined
  text-align: left
  text-transform: uppercase
  padding-left: 0
  margin-left: -15px
  font-size: $font-size-large
  .nav-horizontal__item
    &.is-active,
    &.active,
    &.active-trail
      & > a
        border-top: 2px solid $brand-primary
        padding-top: 8px
  .nav-horizontal__link
    color: $text-color
    &:hover
      text-decoration: none
      border-top: 2px solid $brand-primary
      padding-top: 8px

  • Manage your contact
  • Promote the network
  • Help your clients
sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-sectiontitles
  display: table
  list-style-type: none
  padding: 0

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-sectiontitles > .nav-sectiontitles__item
  display: table-cell
  &:not(:last-child) .nav-sectiontitles__link
    padding-right: 30px

.nav-sectiontitles > .nav-sectiontitles__item
  & > .nav-sectiontitles__link,
  & > * > .nav-sectiontitles__link
    font-family: $font-family-sans-condensed
    text-transform: uppercase
    color: $gray-base
    .icon
      display: none

.nav-sectiontitles .nav-sectiontitles__item .nav-sectiontitles__link
  font-weight: $font-weight
  color: $gray-base

// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-sectiontitles .dropdown
  position: relative
  .dropdown-menu
    position: absolute !important
    background-color: $gray-lighter
    font-size: $font-size-small
    border-radius: 0
    padding: 1px 0 0
    width: 215px
    margin-left: -72px
    top: 91px
    border-bottom: 10px solid $brand-primary
    .nav-sectiontitles__item
      padding-bottom: 0
      &:not(:last-child)
        border-bottom: 1px solid $gray-light
      .dropdown
        padding: 15px 0
    .nav-sectiontitles__link
      padding: 15px 20px
      text-decoration: none
      &:hover
        background: none
    .nav-sectiontitles__item:hover
      background-color: $brand-primary
      font-weight: $headings-font-weight
      .nav-sectiontitles__link
        color: #fff
    // Deeper dropdown level.
    .dropdown > .dropdown-menu
      background-color: $brand-primary
      top: 0
      left: 100%
      margin-top: 0
      margin-left: -1px
      border: none
      .nav-sectiontitles__item
        border-color: $brand-primary-dark
        &:hover
          background-color: $brand-primary-dark
    .dropdown:hover>.dropdown-menu
      display: block

// Deeeper level of last item displayed at left instead of right.
.nav-sectiontitles .nav-sectiontitles__item:last-child .dropdown-menu .dropdown > .dropdown-menu
  left: -100%

.nav-sectiontitles > .nav-sectiontitles__item > .dropdown > .dropdown-menu
  +arrow($gray-light, $gray-lighter, "top", "out", 10px, 102px)

.nav-sectiontitles .ornament:before
  margin-bottom: 5px

• First item
  • Second item
sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tiles
  background-color: $brand-primary
  padding: 0
  margin: 0
  list-style-type: none

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tiles__item
  display: block
  padding-bottom: 0

.nav-tiles__link
  display: block

.nav-tiles__label
  display: block

.nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
  float: left
  width: 40px
  height: 40px
  margin: 5px 20px 5px 0
  position: relative
  display: inline-block
  +circle($brand-primary-light)
  .icon
    position: absolute
    margin: -17px
    top: 50%
    left: 50%
    color: $gray-base
    +icon-size(35px)

.nav-tiles__item
  &:not(:last-child)
    border-bottom: 1px solid lighten($brand-primary-light, 5%)
  .nav-tiles__link
    text-align: left
    overflow: hidden
    color: #fff
    text-transform: uppercase
    height: 50px
    line-height: 50px
    padding: 0 20px
    margin: 0
    border-radius: 0

+breakpoint(tablet)
  .nav-tiles
    display: table
    width: 100%
    table-layout: fixed
  .nav-tiles__item
    border-bottom: none
    display: table-cell
    &:not(:last-child)
      border-right: 1px solid lighten($brand-primary-light, 5%)
  .nav-tiles__label
    text-align: center


@media (min-width: $screen-sm-min) and (max-width: $screen-sm-max)
  .nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
    display: block
    margin-left: auto
    margin-right: auto
    float: none
  .nav-tiles__item .nav-tiles__link
    height: 80px
  .nav-tiles__label
    line-height: $line-height-computed

+breakpoint(desktop)
  .nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
    width: 50px
    height: 50px
    margin: 10px 0
    .icon
      margin: -19.5px
      +icon-size(40px)
  .nav-tiles .nav-tiles__item
    vertical-align: middle
    .nav-tiles__link
      display: table
      width: 100%
      height: 70px
      line-height: $line-height-computed
  .nav-tiles__icon-collumn,
  .nav-tiles__label-collumn
    display: table-cell
    vertical-align: middle
  .nav-tiles__label
    padding: 0 10px
    max-height: 70px
    overflow: hidden


// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__link:hover,
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__link:focus,
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__link.active,
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__item.active-trail
  text-decoration: none
  background-color: darken($brand-primary, 6%)
  .nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
    +circle(darken($brand-primary-light, 4%))

.nav-vertical__link:hover

  background-color: #fff
  text-decoration: none
  font-weight: $font-weight-medium

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.news-carousel
  +make-row
  +no-gutters
  position: relative

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.news-carousel__inner-wrapper
  +make-md-column(9)

.news-carousel__item
  display: table
  width: 100%
  height: $news-carousel-height

.news-carousel__item-row
  display: table-row
  width: 100%
  height: $news-carousel-height
  overflow: hidden

.news-carousel__item-text
  display: table-cell
  background: $orange url("../images/png/angle-gradient.png") center top no-repeat
  padding: 30px
  vertical-align: top
  &, *, a
    color: #fff

.news-carousel__item-media
  display: table-cell
  max-height: 400px
  overflow: hidden

.news-carousel__item-title
  border: none
  margin-top: 0
  &:before,
  &:after
    content: none !important

.news-carousel__list-group
  +make-md-column(3)

.news-carousel__list-group-item
  border-radius: 0px !important
  border: none
  cursor: pointer
  width: 100%
  padding: 0
  display: table
  box-sizing: content-box
  &:not(:last-child)
    margin-bottom: 1px

.news-carousel__list-group-label
  display: table-cell
  height: 70px
  padding: 5px 20px
  vertical-align: middle
  font-size: 14px
  font-family: $font-family-sans-condensed

.news-carousel__show-all
  margin: 10px 10px 0 0

.news-carousel__controls
  position: absolute
  top: 0
  right: 0

.news-carousel__controls-left,
.news-carousel__controls-right
  width: 40px
  height: 40px
  line-height: 40px
  background: $brand-primary
  color: #fff
  display: block
  float: left
  text-align: center
  .icon
    +icon-size(20px)

.news-carousel__controls-left
  margin-right: 1px

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.news-carousel__list-group-item
  &.active
    background-color: $orange
    margin-left: -20px
    padding-left: 20px
  &.active,
  &.active *
    color: #fff
  &:hover,
  &:hover *
    color: #fff
    background-color: $orange !important

.news-carousel__controls-left,
.news-carousel__controls-right
  &:hover
    color: $brand-primary-light

section.description: Base html elements styling

body
  min-width: 320px

// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-pills
  // Fix for centering pills with text-center class in parent element.
  display: inline-block
  > li
    & > a
      color: $gray-light
      &:hover
        background-color: transparent
        color: $text-color
    // Active state
    &.active > a
      &,
      &:hover,
      &:focus
        color: $nav-pills-active-link-hover-color
        background-color: $nav-pills-active-link-hover-bg

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-pills--large
  > li > a
    font-family: $headings-font-family
    font-size: $font-size-h2

.nav-pills--arrows
  &:after
    border-bottom: 1px solid $gray-light
    width: 100%
  > li
    margin-bottom: -1px
    &.active > a
      &,
      &:hover,
      &:focus
        +arrow($gray-light, white, "bottom", "in", 10px, 25px)
        background: transparent
        color: $nav-pills-active-link-hover-bg

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tabs
  border: none
  margin: -8px 0 0
  overflow: hidden
  text-transform: uppercase
  font-weight: $headings-font-weight
  // z-index configuration for .listing--tabs-spacer class of included view.
  position: relative
  z-index: 1
  &:after
    content: ''
    width: 100%
    display: block
    border-bottom: 1px $gray-light solid
    position: absolute
    bottom: 0

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tabs > li
  background-color: $gray-lighter
  margin: 10px 2px 0 0 !important
  font-size: $font-size-base
  padding: 0
  &:first-of-type
    margin-left: 20px !important
  a
    color: darken($gray-light, 35%)
    line-height: $line-height-computed
    padding: 13px 20px
    margin: 0
    border-radius: 0
  &.active
    margin: 6px 3px -1px 0 !important
    z-index: 1
    border-top: 5px solid $tabs-accent !important
    +shadow($gray-lighter, 0, 0, 5px, 2px)
    a
      &,
      &:focus,
      &:hover
        border-left: 1px $gray-light solid
        border-right: 1px $gray-light solid
        margin: 0
        color: $gray-base
        background-color: $tabs-active-background

section.description: Override of Bootstrap's pagination @see http://getbootstrap.com/components/#pagination
section.markup:
• 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • …
section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.pagination
  padding: 0
  margin: 50px 0 40px !important

  & > li
    padding: 0 !important
    margin: 0 !important
    &:before
      display: none

    & > a,
    & > span
      border: none
      border-radius: 25px !important
      color: $gray-lighter

      &:hover,
      &:active,
      &:focus
        background: none
        text-decoration: underline
        color: $gray-darker

    &.active
      & > span
       background-color: $blue-dark
       color: #fff !important

    &.prev,
    &.next
      & > a
        color: $gray-darker
        line-height: 8px
        &:before,
        &:after
          font-size: 34px
          position: relative
          top: 4px
          display: inline-block

    &.prev
      & > a
        &:before
          content: "‹"
          right: 10px

    &.next
      & > a
        &:after
          content: "›"
          left: 10px

    @media (max-width: $screen-xxs-max)
      &.prev,
      &.next
        & > a
          display: block
          width: 100%
          text-align: left
      &.prev > a
          margin-bottom: 20px

      &.next > a
          margin-top: 10px
section.renderMarkup:
• 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • …

section.description: Override of Bootstrap's panels @see http://getbootstrap.com/components/#panels
section.markup:
Panel title #1

First panel body

Panel title #2

Second panel body
section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.panel-group
  .panel
    padding-bottom: 20px
    & + .panel
      margin-top: 0
      padding-top: 20px
      border-top: 1px solid $brand-primary-gray !important
      border-radius: 0
    &:last-child
      padding-bottom: 0

.panel-default
  border: none !important
  +box-shadow(none)
  .panel-heading
    padding: 0
    border-radius: 0 !important
    background: $gray-lighter
    a
      outline: 0
      text-decoration: none
  .panel-title
    padding: 15px 15px
    margin: 0
    @extend .h4
  .panel-body
    margin-top: 20px
    padding: 0
    border: none !important
    &:before,
    &:after
      display: none
    & > *
      &:last-child
        padding-bottom: 0
        margin-bottom: 0
        border-bottom: none

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.panel-group--horizontal
  +rotate(-90, right top)
  z-index: 100
  width: $panel-group-horizontal-height
  height: $panel-group-horizontal-height
  margin: 30px 0 0
  .panel + .panel
    padding-top: 1px
    border: none !important
  .panel
    width: $panel-group-horizontal-height
    padding-bottom: 0
  .panel-heading,
  .panel-collapse
    width: 100%
  .panel-collapse
    height: $panel-group-horizontal-body-width
  .panel-title
    +rotate(180, right 50% 0)
    font-family: $font-family-base
    font-weight: $font-weight
    text-transform: none
    padding: 5px 10px
    height: 30px
  .panel-body
    background-color: $panel-group-horizontal-bg
    position: relative
    width: $panel-group-horizontal-height
    height: $panel-group-horizontal-body-width
    margin: 0
    font-size: $font-size-small
    ul
      margin-left: 0
      padding-left: 10px
      list-style: none
      li:before
        content: ''
        margin: 5px 0 0 -10px
        float: left
        +circle(white, 1px, $orange)
        width: 6px
        height: 6px
        display: block
    big
      font-family: $headings-font-family
      font-weight: $headings-font-weight
      font-size: $font-size-h3
  .panel__rotate-wrapper
    +rotate(90, right top)
    position: absolute
    width: $panel-group-horizontal-body-width
    height: $panel-group-horizontal-height
    right: -$panel-group-horizontal-body-width
    bottom: -$panel-group-horizontal-height
    padding: 20px !important

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.panel.is-active
  .panel-heading
    background-color: $orange
    +arrow($orange, $orange, "bottom", "out", 10px, 30px)
    .panel-title
      color: #fff
      font-weight: $headings-font-weight

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------

.table,
table
  font-size: $font-size-small
  & > thead > tr > th,
  & > thead > tr > td,
  & > tbody > tr > th,
  & > tbody > tr > td,
  & > tfoot > tr > th,
  & > tfoot > tr > td
    text-align: center
    vertical-align: middle
  & > thead > tr > th
    text-transform: uppercase
    font-weight: $font-weight
    background-color: $table-bg-header
    font-size: $font-size-small - 3
    line-height: $line-height-computed / 2
    padding-top: 4px

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.box
  position: relative
  padding: 20px
  margin-bottom: 30px
  background-color: $gray-lighter
  font-size: $font-size-h4
  overflow: hidden
  & > *
    z-index: 2
    position: relative
  .btn .icon
    color: $brand-primary
  .btn-default
    background-color: $gray-lighter
  a
    &:hover,
    &:active,
    &:focus
      color: $gray-base
      text-decoration: none
  strong
    color: $brand-primary
  select
    background-color: #fff
  p:last-child
    margin-bottom: 0

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.box__bg
  position: absolute
  left: 10px
  top: 50%
  margin: -85px 0
  color: $gray-lighter
  z-index: 1
  font-weight: 600
  +icon-size(170px)

.box__media
  margin: 0 -20px -20px
  img
    width: 100%

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.box--icon-to-right
  .box__bg
    left: auto
    right: -50px

.box--half-icon
  &:not(.box--icon-to-right) .box__bg
    left: -50px
  &.box--icon-to-right .box__bg
    right: -105px

.box--small
  padding-top: 10px
  padding-bottom: 10px
  margin-bottom: 10px
  font-size: $font-size-base
  strong
    color: $gray-base

.box--show-more__wrapper
  overflow: hidden
  position: relative

.box--brand-primary
  background-color: $brand-primary
  color: #fff
  .box__bg
    color: $brand-primary-dark

.box--arrow-bottom
  +arrow($brand-primary, $brand-primary, "bottom", "out", 15px, 110px)
  overflow: visible

// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.box
  .middle-align
    width: 100%
  .middle-align__col
    text-align: left
  .listing__header
    margin: -20px -20px 20px
    padding: 0 20px
    background-color: $gray-lighter
    .listing__header-title
      margin: 10px 0 5px
      border: none
  h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6
    margin-top: 0

.box--brand-primary
  .btn .icon
    color: #fff
  .btn-default
    background-color: $gray-base
    border-color: $gray-base
    color: #fff
  // Dependency on .contact component
  .contact__icon
    color: $brand-primary-lighter
    border-color: $brand-primary-lighter
  .contact__row
    padding-bottom: $line-height-computed / 2
  &.contact--listing
    padding: 15px 15px 0
    margin: 0
    border: none
    .contact
      padding: 0
      border: none
  // Dependency on .listung component
  .listing__header
    background-color: $brand-primary-dark
    border-bottom: 1px solid $brand-primary-light
    .listing__header-title
      color: #fff
  a
    color: #fff
  strong
    color: #fff

.box--light
  background-color: $almost-white

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.counter
  position: relative
  text-transform: uppercase
  color: $gray-base
  overflow: hidden
  text-align: left

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.counter__pie
  position: static
  width: 60px
  height: 60px
  padding-top: 0
  vertical-align: middle
  font-size: $font-size-small - 3px
  line-height: 26px
  canvas
    position: absolute
    left: 0
    top: 0

.counter__left
  font-size: $font-size-h3 + 6
  height: 60px
  line-height: 60px
  text-align: center
  display: block
  font-weight: bold

.counter__label
  position: absolute
  top: 10px
  left: 75px
  font-weight: 600
  line-height: 26px
  font-size: $font-size-base

.counter__caption
  position: absolute
  left: 75px
  top: 34px
  font-size: $font-size-small - 2
  br
    display: none

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.counter.is-big
  text-align: center
  .counter__pie
    position: relative
    width: auto
    width: 120px
    height: 120px
    margin-bottom: 5px
  .counter__left
    padding-top: 40px
    font-size: $font-size-h1
    font-weight: 700
    line-height: $line-height-computed + 2
  .counter__label
    top: 70px
    left: 0
    right: 0
    font-size: $font-size-small - 3
  .counter__caption
    position: static
    top: auto
    left: auto
    font-size: $font-size-small
    br
      display: inline

.counter--fixed-big
  width: 120px
  margin: 0 10px 10px
  float: left

.counter--open
  &.counter.is-big
    .counter__label
      top: 0
      left: 0
      right: 0
      line-height: 120px
      font-size: $font-size-h3
      font-weight: bold
    .counter__left
      display: none

section.description: Set of WAAT icons for any occasion. Since icons are fonts, they can be placed anywhere where text is placed and are sized automatically to match the surrounding child. Color of the icon might be declared same way as for text.
section.css:
// Component

// Import the fonts
@font-face
  font-family: 'WAAT Icons'
  src: url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.eot")
  src: url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.eot?#iefix") format("embedded-opentype"), url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.woff") format("woff"), url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.ttf") format("truetype"), url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.svg#icomoon") format("svg")


.icon
  font-family: 'WAAT Icons'
  speak: none
  font-style: normal
  font-weight: normal
  font-variant: normal
  text-transform: none

  display: inline-block

  position: relative
  top: 6px
  margin-top: -8px

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.middle-align
  +middle-align

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.middle-align__row
  // Row settings inherit from mixin

.middle-align__col
  // Col settings inherit from mixin

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.middle-align--mobile-single-column
  .middle-align__col
    display: block
    text-align: center
    padding-right: 0
    .middle-align__media
      width: 100%

  +breakpoint(desktop)
    .middle-align__col
      display: table-cell
      text-align: inherit
      &:not(:last-child)
        padding-right: 30px
      .middle-align__media
        width: auto

.middle-align--more-paddings
  padding: 25px 0

  +breakpoint(tablet)
    padding: 30px 0

  +breakpoint(desktop)
    padding: 40px 0

.middle-align--no-paddings
  padding: 0

.middle-align--condensed
  .middle-align__col:not(:last-child)
    padding-right: 5px

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-horizontal
  margin: 0
  font-size: $font-size-small
  margin: 15px 0

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-horizontal .nav-horizontal__item
  padding: 0 15px
  display: inline

.nav-horizontal__link
  color: $brand-primary-dark
  display: inline-block
  text-align: center

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-horizontal--condensed
  .nav-horizontal__item
    padding: 0 3px
    font-size: $font-size-xsmall
    &:not(:last-child)
      border-right: 1px solid $gray-base

.nav-horizontal--activeoverlined
  text-align: left
  text-transform: uppercase
  padding-left: 0
  margin-left: -15px
  font-size: $font-size-large
  .nav-horizontal__item
    &.is-active,
    &.active,
    &.active-trail
      & > a
        border-top: 2px solid $brand-primary
        padding-top: 8px
  .nav-horizontal__link
    color: $text-color
    &:hover
      text-decoration: none
      border-top: 2px solid $brand-primary
      padding-top: 8px

section.description: Justified navigation in style of section title. Looks good with ornament component that might indicate color of site section.
section.markup:
• The network
  • Manage your contact
  • Promote the network
  • Help your clients
section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-sectiontitles
  display: table
  list-style-type: none
  padding: 0

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-sectiontitles > .nav-sectiontitles__item
  display: table-cell
  &:not(:last-child) .nav-sectiontitles__link
    padding-right: 30px

.nav-sectiontitles > .nav-sectiontitles__item
  & > .nav-sectiontitles__link,
  & > * > .nav-sectiontitles__link
    font-family: $font-family-sans-condensed
    text-transform: uppercase
    color: $gray-base
    .icon
      display: none

.nav-sectiontitles .nav-sectiontitles__item .nav-sectiontitles__link
  font-weight: $font-weight
  color: $gray-base

// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-sectiontitles .dropdown
  position: relative
  .dropdown-menu
    position: absolute !important
    background-color: $gray-lighter
    font-size: $font-size-small
    border-radius: 0
    padding: 1px 0 0
    width: 215px
    margin-left: -72px
    top: 91px
    border-bottom: 10px solid $brand-primary
    .nav-sectiontitles__item
      padding-bottom: 0
      &:not(:last-child)
        border-bottom: 1px solid $gray-light
      .dropdown
        padding: 15px 0
    .nav-sectiontitles__link
      padding: 15px 20px
      text-decoration: none
      &:hover
        background: none
    .nav-sectiontitles__item:hover
      background-color: $brand-primary
      font-weight: $headings-font-weight
      .nav-sectiontitles__link
        color: #fff
    // Deeper dropdown level.
    .dropdown > .dropdown-menu
      background-color: $brand-primary
      top: 0
      left: 100%
      margin-top: 0
      margin-left: -1px
      border: none
      .nav-sectiontitles__item
        border-color: $brand-primary-dark
        &:hover
          background-color: $brand-primary-dark
    .dropdown:hover>.dropdown-menu
      display: block

// Deeeper level of last item displayed at left instead of right.
.nav-sectiontitles .nav-sectiontitles__item:last-child .dropdown-menu .dropdown > .dropdown-menu
  left: -100%

.nav-sectiontitles > .nav-sectiontitles__item > .dropdown > .dropdown-menu
  +arrow($gray-light, $gray-lighter, "top", "out", 10px, 102px)

.nav-sectiontitles .ornament:before
  margin-bottom: 5px
section.renderMarkup:
• The network
  • Manage your contact
  • Promote the network
  • Help your clients

section.description: Justified, fully responsive navigation with icons. Menu becomes horizontal on phone devices.
section.markup:
• First item
  • Second item
section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tiles
  background-color: $brand-primary
  padding: 0
  margin: 0
  list-style-type: none

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tiles__item
  display: block
  padding-bottom: 0

.nav-tiles__link
  display: block

.nav-tiles__label
  display: block

.nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
  float: left
  width: 40px
  height: 40px
  margin: 5px 20px 5px 0
  position: relative
  display: inline-block
  +circle($brand-primary-light)
  .icon
    position: absolute
    margin: -17px
    top: 50%
    left: 50%
    color: $gray-base
    +icon-size(35px)

.nav-tiles__item
  &:not(:last-child)
    border-bottom: 1px solid lighten($brand-primary-light, 5%)
  .nav-tiles__link
    text-align: left
    overflow: hidden
    color: #fff
    text-transform: uppercase
    height: 50px
    line-height: 50px
    padding: 0 20px
    margin: 0
    border-radius: 0

+breakpoint(tablet)
  .nav-tiles
    display: table
    width: 100%
    table-layout: fixed
  .nav-tiles__item
    border-bottom: none
    display: table-cell
    &:not(:last-child)
      border-right: 1px solid lighten($brand-primary-light, 5%)
  .nav-tiles__label
    text-align: center


@media (min-width: $screen-sm-min) and (max-width: $screen-sm-max)
  .nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
    display: block
    margin-left: auto
    margin-right: auto
    float: none
  .nav-tiles__item .nav-tiles__link
    height: 80px
  .nav-tiles__label
    line-height: $line-height-computed

+breakpoint(desktop)
  .nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
    width: 50px
    height: 50px
    margin: 10px 0
    .icon
      margin: -19.5px
      +icon-size(40px)
  .nav-tiles .nav-tiles__item
    vertical-align: middle
    .nav-tiles__link
      display: table
      width: 100%
      height: 70px
      line-height: $line-height-computed
  .nav-tiles__icon-collumn,
  .nav-tiles__label-collumn
    display: table-cell
    vertical-align: middle
  .nav-tiles__label
    padding: 0 10px
    max-height: 70px
    overflow: hidden


// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__link:hover,
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__link:focus,
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__link.active,
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__item.active-trail
  text-decoration: none
  background-color: darken($brand-primary, 6%)
  .nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
    +circle(darken($brand-primary-light, 4%))

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.news-carousel
  +make-row
  +no-gutters
  position: relative

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.news-carousel__inner-wrapper
  +make-md-column(9)

.news-carousel__item
  display: table
  width: 100%
  height: $news-carousel-height

.news-carousel__item-row
  display: table-row
  width: 100%
  height: $news-carousel-height
  overflow: hidden

.news-carousel__item-text
  display: table-cell
  background: $orange url("../images/png/angle-gradient.png") center top no-repeat
  padding: 30px
  vertical-align: top
  &, *, a
    color: #fff

.news-carousel__item-media
  display: table-cell
  max-height: 400px
  overflow: hidden

.news-carousel__item-title
  border: none
  margin-top: 0
  &:before,
  &:after
    content: none !important

.news-carousel__list-group
  +make-md-column(3)

.news-carousel__list-group-item
  border-radius: 0px !important
  border: none
  cursor: pointer
  width: 100%
  padding: 0
  display: table
  box-sizing: content-box
  &:not(:last-child)
    margin-bottom: 1px

.news-carousel__list-group-label
  display: table-cell
  height: 70px
  padding: 5px 20px
  vertical-align: middle
  font-size: 14px
  font-family: $font-family-sans-condensed

.news-carousel__show-all
  margin: 10px 10px 0 0

.news-carousel__controls
  position: absolute
  top: 0
  right: 0

.news-carousel__controls-left,
.news-carousel__controls-right
  width: 40px
  height: 40px
  line-height: 40px
  background: $brand-primary
  color: #fff
  display: block
  float: left
  text-align: center
  .icon
    +icon-size(20px)

.news-carousel__controls-left
  margin-right: 1px

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.news-carousel__list-group-item
  &.active
    background-color: $orange
    margin-left: -20px
    padding-left: 20px
  &.active,
  &.active *
    color: #fff
  &:hover,
  &:hover *
    color: #fff
    background-color: $orange !important

.news-carousel__controls-left,
.news-carousel__controls-right
  &:hover
    color: $brand-primary-light
